name: IEAmerica
startIntroPart1: President Washington, we salute you and the proud American civilization! Freed from the British dominion in the 18th century, then cleansed and reborn after a terrible civil war, the United States nation was ready to play its great role in the 20th century. At the height of its power, triumphant after two terrible world wars, United States of America, a land of immigration, opportunities, optimism and determination, has risen above all other weakening nations, unable to equal such power.
startIntroPart2: President Washington, will you show to the world the legitimacy of the American way of life, and spread the flame of liberty to all mankind? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Your wanton aggression leaves us no choice. Prepare for war!
attacked: You have mistaken our love of peace for weakness. You shall regret this!
defeated: The day...is yours. I hope you will be merciful in your triumph.
introduction: The people of the United States of America welcome you.
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
uniques: [+15]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities]
[-75]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
Starts with [Commerce] adopted
[+2 Gold] from every [Strategic resource]
Double quantity of [Coal] produced
Double quantity of [Aluminum] produced

name: French Empire
startIntroPart1: Vive Napoleon I, First Consul and Emperor of France! After the glorious Revolution which suppressed the centuries-old monarchy, the French nation stood at the heart of Europe as a Republic, and intended to export its ideals to the entire European continent, either by diplomacy or war. The French Capital Paris was more than ever the world center of Culture, Arts, and Letters. With its Great Army, reputed as one of the greatest in the History, France fought gloriously all surrounding enemies, but eventually fell against the coalition of other European powers.
startIntroPart2: Napoleon Bonaparte, ruler of the French people, will you rebuild the Empire to take revenge on your foes, and make again of its Capital the City of Lights? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You're disturbing us, prepare for war.
attacked: You've fallen into my trap. I'll bury you.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: Welcome. I'm Napoleon, of France; the smartest military man in world history.
tradeRequest: France offers you this exceptional proposition.
uniques: [+2] Movement <for [Military] units>
[-50]% maintenance costs <for [Land] units>
Starts with [Honor] adopted

name: Great Britain
startIntroPart1: King George III, sovereign of the British Empire and ruler of the seas, your fleets dominate the waves.
startIntroPart2: Will Britannia continue to rule or be cast down from its lofty perch?
declaringWar: Britain shall not bow to tyranny!
attacked: The empire answers with cannon and courage.
introduction: I am George III, King of Great Britain and Ireland. May our dealings be civil—and brief.
hateHello: Your presence is an insult to Britain.
uniques: [+2] Movement <for [Water] units>
[+20]% Strength <for [Water] units>
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+25]% more Influence
Allied City-States provide [Production] equal to [+25]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [+10]% of what they produce for themselves

name: Austrian Empire
startIntroPart1: Emperor Francis II, last Holy Roman Emperor and ruler of Austria, your empire stands at the heart of Europe.
startIntroPart2: Will you preserve the old order or give way to revolution?
attacked: The Empire will not crumble quietly.
introduction: I am Francis II, Emperor of Austria and defender of tradition. Speak, if you value peace.
neutralHello: Austria listens but does not trust easily.
hateHello: You threaten the stability of Europe.
uniques: [+15]% Great Person generation [in all cities] <for every [Completed Policy branches]> <hidden from users>
[-10]% enemy spy effectiveness [in all cities] <for every [Completed Policy branches]> <hidden from users>
Comment [Completing a policy branch grants +15% Great Person generation and reduces enemy spy effectiveness by -10% in all cities]

name: Kingdom of Prussia
startIntroPart1: King Frederick William III, ruler of Prussia and reformer of the army, your kingdom stands as Europe's rising sword.
startIntroPart2: Can you transform defeat into destiny and lead Prusia to greatness?
declaringWar: Prussia shall bring order through steel!
introduction: I am Frederick William III of Prussia. Speak quickly, and with purpose.
uniques: [+3 Production, +2 Science, +2 Happiness] <with a garrison>
[+25]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities] <when at war>
[-50]% Gold cost of upgrading <when at war>

name: Russian Empire
startIntroPart1: Tsar Alexander I, sovereign of the vast Russian Empire, your armies endure where others falter.
startIntroPart2: Will you defend your realm or strike at the heart of Europe?
attacked: The snows will be your grave!
introduction: I am Alexander, Emperor of All Russia. Let us speak with civility, if not trust.
hateHello: We have no more patience for you.
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities] <when at war>
[+10]% Strength <for [Land] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
[Great General] is earned [+20]% faster <for [Land] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
[-30]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
